I checked into the area and it s BEAUTIFUL!  I m getting a city guide sent
to me for information on the area.  If you all are interested you can get

messages.messageBody:
I checked into the area and it's BEAUTIFUL! I'm getting a city guide sent
to me for information on the area. If you all are interested you can get
that here: http://www.blackmountain.org/contactus.php


Lesa
http://lifeacademy.homeschooljournal.net
http://the3lboutique.has.it
-------Original Message-------

From: Sandra Dodd
Date: 08/26/06 14:11:42
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Next fall, a conference in North Carolina

About the 2007 Live and Learn Conference, Kelly Lovejoy wrote today:

-=- Next year will be in Black Mountain, NC---just outside of
Asheville. It's a YMCA camp. With hotel accommodations, cabins, and a
family lodge. No tent or RV camping, but there is a KOA 3 miles away.
It's a beautiful area, and the camp has so much to offer. We've
signed a two year contract with the option of five more, so we're
planning to settle here if we like it. Always the weekend after Labor
Day.

I will send more details on the camp after this year's conference.-=-

==============

Those who want info on such things should join the Live and Learn list
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/LiveandLearnConference/

And even if you can't go to this year's conference, you might want to
follow the discussion of plans for next fall's, which is including
talk about regional conferences in the Spring, maybe in Arizona,
maybe in northern California, likely other places too.

Sandra



Yahoo! Groups Links








[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
